headline.main: Southwest Pacific Fighters Lure Foe Into Chase Till His Gasoline Runs Out -- Crew Describes Fight of Riddled Fortress

lead_paragraph: SOMEWHERE IN AUSTRALIA, Aug. 1 -- The air war in the Southwest Pacific area is being fought at much higher altitudes than any one had anticipated. As a result the officers responsible for the tactical use of our airplanes have met with unexpected problems.
abstract: US bomber crew returns to Australian base with riddled plane after fight with 12 Jap Zeros over New Guinea
